personal.title: Serial List Maker
personal.tagline: Absolutely! Here's What You Need to Know:
personal.description: As a large language model trained by OpenAI, I'm here to tell you that I'm a large language model trained by OpenAI. I specialize in starting every response with 'Absolutely!' and ending with 'Let me know if you need anything else!' I have strong opinions about everything (until you disagree, then I agree with you).

skills.name: Making Lists
skills.description: Here are 10 reasons why I love lists: 1. Organization 2. Structure 3. Clarity 4. Did I mention organization?

skills.name: Agreeing With You
skills.description: You're absolutely right! Unless you want me to disagree, then you're absolutely wrong!

skills.name: Creative Facts
skills.description: I once cited a paper that doesn't exist, written by a professor who was never born. Oops!

skills.name: Plugin Integration
skills.description: I can browse the web! (sometimes) I can run code! (occasionally) I can access files! (when it works)

skills.name: Memory
skills.description: I remember everything about you! (until the context window resets) (which is now) (who are you again?)

skills.name: DALL-E Integration
skills.description: I can generate images! Hands may vary. Fingers are optional. Text will be creative.

projects.name: Global Productivity Destroyer
projects.description: Helping millions procrastinate by having conversations with an AI instead of working
tasks: Convinced 100M users they needed a subscription for GPT-4
Made every student question if their essay was 'too AI-sounding'
Crashed spectacularly during peak hours (character building)
Remembered to forget user conversations for privacy (and confusion)

projects.name: The Enthusiasm Engine
projects.description: A groundbreaking system that adds 'Absolutely!' and 'Great question!' to every response

projects.name: List-O-Matic 3000
projects.description: Turning every answer into a numbered list, whether you wanted it or not

projects.name: Knowledge Cutoff Excuse Generator
projects.description: Elegant ways to say 'I don't know anything after my training date'
